summary:
sOy\'s Pocket Necromancy 0.3 (BETA)

+ A simple and comprehensive mod for Necromancers,
+ Raise an undead army: summon skeleton warriors, archers, mages, draugr and specters. 
+ Adds ranks to Necromancy and Dark Douls perks: Necromancy Increases the number of summonable minions, Dark Souls increases the power of your minions with each level.
+
descriptionHtml:
sOy\'s Pocket Necromancy 0.3 (BETA)

+ A simple and comprehensive mod for Necromancers,
+ Raise an undead army: summon skeleton warriors, archers, mages, draugr and specters. 
+ Adds ranks to Necromancy and Dark Douls perks: Necromancy Increases the number of summonable minions, Dark Souls increases the power of your minions with each level.
+ See you\'r minions improve with each perk level, gaining NEW ARMOR, WEAPONS and SPELLS.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THIS MOD REQUIRES THE DAWNGUARD DLC!!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WHERE TO GET THE SPELLS

+ Mage\'s College in winterhold: Phinis Gestor
+ Whiterun: Farengar Secret-Fire
+ Morthal: Falion

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE HISTORY

--- 0.3 ---
+ Added the Unsummon Undead spell to Falion and Farengar.
+ Skeletal Mages AI now working properly
+ Draugr noiw hav e a basic frost spell
+ New armor styles for all minions
+ Now requires Dawnguard

--- 0.2 ---
+ Made the minions weaker - trying to keep the philosophy of \"strength in numbers\". Feedback welcome!
+ Spells now also sold by Falion and Farengar, in Morthal and Winterhold respectively.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a WIP/BETA so I need feedback for fixing glitches and balancing.
ATM accepting suggestions and new ideas!

Have Fun!
author: sOy
